metadata.description: In the return of these crossover comics, the JLA take on Predators—in adaptive superhero form! Batman teams up with Tarzan to resist the claws of the Cat-Woman. Kyle Rayner must don the mantle of Green Lantern to turn back a tide of Aliens. Superteens Spyboy and Young Justice must defeat nightmarish foes. Collects JLA versus Predator, Batman/Tarzan: Claws of the Cat-Woman, Green Lantern versus Aliens,and Spyboy/Young Justice: Young Spies Like Us.
metadata.name: Dark Horse Comics/DC Comics: Justice League
